title: The Big A? The Fruit Company? Why the Maker of iPhones Must Not Be Named.
sub_head: A tech giant is known to billions, but suppliers hardly ever mention its name; ‘the honored North American customer’
body:
TOKYO—It is the dominant American maker of smartphones, a household name to billions and for many makers of high-tech parts their most important customer ever.
Just don’t ask who it is.
